title: 6.18 Ranked bug?
body: https://i.gyazo.com/thumb/200/_9bcac75a4b53d6b97c53170ebecd6b47-jpg.jpg After applying the update I saw that my ranked said "Placement Matches" but I am silver 4 with 33 LP. Do I actually have to redo my ranked placements or will it be fixed?

replies.body: There's a visual display issue right now with the profile screen showing as Placements.  Everything with your stats remain fine, and this should be fixed up as soon as the[ current maintenance](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) is over.  Thanks for the heads up!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=N9Vh29xP,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-08T20:24:26.252+0000)
>
> There's a visual display issue right now with the profile screen showing as Placements.  Everything with your stats remain fine, and this should be fixed up soon as soon as the[ current maintenance](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) is over.  Thanks for the heads up!

Since the league system is down.  Do promo wins still count?  Or will they not retroactively show up when the maintenance is over?
Games will still be counted as normal!  The only thing that will really be noticeable is the visual display.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=N9Vh29xP,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2016-09-08T20:29:26.572+0000)
>
> Games will still be counted as normal!  The only thing that will really be noticeable is the visual display.

Thanks Porocles!

I am having the same thing. After I played my ranked match today I went to check if I was in promos or not (because I thought I should have been) so now I am just wondering if I should wait till this is fixed, or if ranked still works just fine, I just can't see it right now.

This is likely due to Riot disabling the Leagues (ranked) system since they are currently performing maintenance. For now, you will be unable to view your rank or ranked stats. I'm guessing this will be fixed once the maintenance is done.
